meanings.definition: Capable of returning to its original shape or size after being stretched or compressed.
meanings.sent1: The elastomeric band stretched easily and then bounced back to its original form.
meanings.sent2: The elastomeric material in the rubber band allowed it to stretch without breaking.
meanings.sent3: The elastomeric balloon could be squished and pulled in all directions without popping.
meanings.sent4: Her elastomeric resilience in the face of challenges was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The elastomeric nature of the bouncy ball made it a favorite toy among children.

meanings.definition: A material exhibiting elastomeric properties, such as rubber or silicone.
meanings.sent1: The elastomeric used in the production of tires ensures flexibility and durability.
meanings.sent2: Rubber is a common elastomeric material known for its stretchiness.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen gloves made of elastomeric material made washing dishes a fun task.
meanings.sent4: The elastomeric sealant kept the water out of the basement during heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended an elastomeric wrist brace to support the injured joint.
